titleStmt.title: The great victory vvhich God hath giuen vnto eight Holland shippes in their passage toward the East Indies: against 17. great Spanish shippes on the first of Aprill, 1613. Translated out of the Dutch copie, printed at Middleborough, by Symon Mollenaer, 1613.
titleStmt.author: Mollenaer, Symon.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by George Eld, For Thomas Bushel,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
